body.name: mopio Chloe Futon Sofa Bed, 77.5", Couch, Small Sofa, Sleeper Sofa, Loveseat, Mid Century Modern Futon Couch, Sofa Cama, Couches for Living Room (Light Gray Fabric, Futon)
features: Dimensions: 77.5 (W) X 33 (D) X 28.3 (H) inches; with 30-day return and 1-year warranty

Versatile Functionality: Sit, lounge or sleep with 3 adjustable splitback fold-down backrest settings. Accommodates seating for 3 and easily transforms into a compact futon bed for 1, suitable for both living and guest room
Firm & Sturdy: High-quality foam seat that provides a firm and comfortable sitting experience as well as a good night's sleep. Holds up to 550 lbs, making it a reliable and durable choice
Timeless Design: Combining modern lines with mid-century modern details, such as chevron tufting and tapered plastic legs, this piece features a timeless design that adds style to any decor
Easy Maintenance: 7.9" height clearance for easy cleaning access
Simple Assembly: 2-person assembly in just 20 minutes with clear step-by-step guide. Arm rests, legs and hardware are conveniently located in the zippers under the seat for quick setup

Color Variation & Measurement Disclaimer: Please expect color variance between actual product and photos due to different lighting conditions and online viewing device settings. Please be aware that measurements stated may vary up to 0.5 inches due to mass production, please allocate for 0.5 inches difference when measuring before purchase

Is the Chloe Futon comfortable? Chloe is designed to be on the firmer side to provide a supportive and resilient seating experience, ensuring lasting comfort without the risk of premature sinking into the seats and allowing you to enjoy its quality for years to come. Where can I find the armrest, legs and hardware? Armrest, legs and hardware can be found in the zippers under the seat. The color looks different from images shown, what should I do? Our products are shot usually under studio lightings which are brighter. However, our products color variation will not differ from the actual product. How many packages should I be expected to receive? Two. You will be receiving two packages from us and may arrive at different times due to ground logistics. What is the return policy? Returns accepted within Amazon's 30-day window. Reach out with images/videos for speedy processing. Be cautious of potential fees for returns lacking seller or Amazon labels. Further clarifications can be requested.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really beautiful teal futon
reviews.reviewText: I really love the look of this futon. The color is gorgeous. It is firm but not uncomfortable. Feels very sturdy and easy to lay down into a bed. It is lower to the ground, but that's expected for a futon. I built it by myself in about 20 minutes. I think it's a really nice sofa for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect couch for a small space
reviews.reviewText: I just moved in to my first place and the living room isn't giant but I wanted something that could also be converted into a bed when guests stay over. The orange is a perfect pop of color and the velvet is super easy to clean. It's not the softest fluffiest couch out there but for the price it is extremely comfortable. When it's folded down the seam from seat to the back is a tad uncomfortable but will get less stiff with use. Overall a purchase well worth its price, and assembly and delivery was super simple!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a small sofa bed, or futon for my new apartmentI bought a cheap one but it was awful, seating are is small, the back are also small and don't stay in placeThen I had this one on my list for weeks, until finally I got it, in the peach color as it had a discounted priceIt's beautiful and well made. Very comfortable and easy to put it togetherThe only shortcomings I see for now - I received it today - are the legs and the bracketsAll legs are made of hard plastic imitating wood. I wish they were metalAlso, the two middle legs are the ones with brackets to keep both halves together. It's a bad idea to use plastic for thatAt least the middle legs should be metal or have a metal bracket insertAny vertical move of the sofa halves will put all stress on those plastic brackets and they are not rigid enoughThe legs could be made of a harder, better and reinforced plasticMy solution for now was to use the metal brackets intended for the arms as elements to keep the halves togetherThe metal brackets luckily have the exact same measurements as of the middle legs brackets, so I use them together, under each middle leg, I screwed the metal brackets in a sandwich fashionTo be honest, I don't know why the arms have brackets, as the idea to easy remove the arms is one of the things that made me buy this unitThe sofa became way more stableAs final thought, if this unit was a single pice, it would be a perfect small sofa bedPlus, metal legs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chic and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I liked how easy it was to assemble. I mostly did it myself. I asked my neighbor to help me turn it upright and down a few times with me because it was heavy and did not want to either hurt myself or damage something. I’ve sat on it and laid on it and it’s very comfort. It’s a nice material and looks great in my studio. I recommend for the price, style and ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent product at an ok price
reviews.reviewText: The color and style of the sofa is very nice. Assembly is quite easy. MAKE SURE you check all piece. They're typically stores in the zipper pocket of the couch. Hardware and parts are here. One of our couches was missing the entire set so had to order a replacement.The sofa is comfortable for someone as long as you're not trying to sit for several hrs. If you do you'll notice its not that comfortable.In sleep mode this can be a temporary bed for a kid or small adult. You may need tonadd a mattress pad and linens to make it more comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small sofa for studio
reviews.reviewText: I was searching a small sofa for my tiny studio. I wanted something not expansive, but still that could look nice. After a lot of options, I finally made my decision. And I don't regret. For this price it was hard to find something nice, not too big and not too small. I also needed a convertible option. This sofa looks nice, nice material, comfy enough. Still a bit small, it could be nicier if it was a bit bigger. But anyway, for the money - it's perfect. The delivery was fast and smooth. The set up was easy, a bit heavy, but I was able to set it up by myself without any additional help. Strongly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Buyer Beware this is TERRIBLE and so is MOPIO
reviews.reviewText: We read the reviews and decided to give it a shot. BIG mistake!! When it arrived; we opened up the boxes (its comes in 2 boxes about 59lbs each and 38”x36”x9” size boxes) took it out and put it together. My wife and I both sat down on it in the couch position and immediately gave each other the same look. It was super firm with very little back support and the seat area was very small. We then folded it flat and each tried to lay on it…HORRENDOUS!! There’s a spot right in the middle where it folds flat that is hard as a rock, making it completely unusable. I’m 6’2” and can’t even lay on it without my knees bent. My 8yr old son tried to lay on it and immediately said it was not comfortable. I contacted the seller to return it and they asked multiple questions about it before sending a return label, but we have to pay shipping to return it. The seller probably has a FedEx account for shipping, but we have to pay to ship it back and the shipping is about the same price as this useless futon!! I will never in a million years recommend buying anything from Mopio!!UPDATE: after posting this review; the seller decided to refund the purchase and asked us to donate the futon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Purchase for First Apartment
reviews.reviewText: Like many of the previous buyers, I searched Amazon for a long while before I settled on this couch! I got it because of the color (and the price). I love how this blue will pop with the rest of my living room decor. I also love that I didn't break the bank to get something that looks good. It's also pretty comfortable.First, I loved how quickly I received the item. Both boxes for the couch came together and it took about 2 days for me to get them! They both arrived at my door, and they weren't too heavy to move. But it should be noted that I have a ground floor apartment unit--so no stairs for me! Second, it took me about 10 minutes to put this together. The assembly is very straightforward and there are not a million little pieces. The instructions were pretty clear, and the diagrams were very well written/drawn. Third, I think it's comfortable. It's defiantly on the firmer side. But I appreciate this because I don't want to sink into my couch. It's just great for sitting upright and working. I'm sure it would be fine as a bed for a night or two. Overall, I'm very satisfied with the purchase! It will be a great addition to my new apartment.
